data.prayer: Father, encourage the 875 believers in Zaječarski to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zaječarski, Serbia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Zaječarski, Serbia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Zaječarski who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Zaječarski, Serbia to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Turk people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Turk people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Turk people is yours.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Zaječarski, Serbia.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Zaječarski access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.section_summary:
the state of Zaječarski, Serbia has a population of 121,800.

We estimate Zaječarski has 875 people who might know Jesus, 95,611 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 25,314 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 139 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 875 believers in the state of Zaječarski to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
